events.message: I purchased a jacket last week and want to return it because it does not fit properly. Please let me know how to get a refund.
The case has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for returning the product and receiving their money back.
This case has been assigned to support agent Sarah Thompson for refund processing and follow-up communication.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with your jacket return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and with the original tags? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is unused and I still have the original tags attached as required.
Thank you for the details. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid return slip we will email you shortly. After receiving it, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I'll send the jacket back today using the return slip once I receive it.
We have received the returned jacket and the refund has been successfully processed to your original payment method. Please allow a few days for it to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with. Thank you for shopping with us.
This refund case has now been closed after confirming customer satisfaction and successful refund completion. We appreciate your business.
